snippet: The American cyclist Levi Leipheimer was fired by the Omega Pharma-Quick Step team after confessing to doping as part of the Lance Armstrong investigation.
abstract: Cyclist Levi Leipheimer is fired by Omega Pharma-Quick Step team after confessing to doping.
lead_paragraph: The American cyclist Levi Leipheimer was fired by the Omega Pharma-Quick Step team after confessing to doping as part of the Lance Armstrong investigation.

headline.seo: Levi Leipheimer Dropped From Cycling Team
